CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This result suggests that the morphologies of all the active films are very similar , so that such a property will not affect the J sc of the photovoltaic devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. Morphologies of all the active films
2. Such a property
3. J sc (Junction Scfficiency)
4. Photovoltaic devices
5. Active films

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are not explicitly mentioned. However, based on the context, "active films" can be assumed to refer to the semiconductor or photoactive materials used in the photovoltaic devices.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
1. Active films (semiconductor or photoactive materials used in photovoltaic devices)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Active films (semiconductor or photoactive materials used in photovoltaic devices) |

1. morphologies of all the active films
2. such a property
3. J sc (Junction Solar Cell efficiency or Short-Circuit Current)

2. such a property (implies a material property that is being referred to but not explicitly stated)
3. J sc (Junction Solar Cell efficiency or Short-Circuit Current, a material property related to the electrical conductivity of the active films in photovoltaic devices)

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This result suggests that the morphologies of all the active films are very similar , so that such a property will not affect the J sc of the photovoltaic devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. morphologies of all the active films: This refers to the physical shape or form of the active layers in the photovoltaic devices. It is a property of the active films.
2. such a property: In this context, "such a property" likely refers to the morphology of the active films mentioned earlier.
3. J sc of the photovoltaic devices: J sc stands for the short-circuit current density, which is a measure of the maximum current that a photovoltaic device can generate under standard test conditions. It is a property of the photovoltaic devices.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. morphologies of all the active films: This refers to the physical shape or form of the active layers in the photovoltaic devices. It is a property of the active films.
2. J sc: J sc stands for the short-circuit current density, which is a measure of the maximum current that a photovoltaic device can generate under standard test conditions. It is a property of the photovoltaic devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| morphologies of all the active films |
| J sc |
